/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on the automated burial and plot or interment allowance, including
automated burials under the FNOD process
, and
how VBA generates an automated burial and plot or interment allowance through the FNOD process
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A  - General Information on Burial Benefits and Allowances
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
